info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 1:31PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 mph or greater expected. * WHERE...Portions of western and north central Arkansas, including the higher terrain of the Ozark and Ouachita Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
